code: import React from"react-bootstrap";import Row from"react-bootstrap/Row";import Col from"react-bootstrap/Col";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var FromTheFounder=function FromTheFounder(props){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"from-the-founder",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Row,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:"6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"w-100 mb-4",src:"images/woman.jpg",alt:"Woman"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Col,{md:"6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"From The Founder:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Before ice cream, my entrepreneurial journey was all about a different dessert."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"In 2002, I opened Cupcakes, the first ever cupcakes-only bakery, which I co-founded with my best friend Heather White. In less than 10 years, we franchised Cupcakes across Canada and even co-starred in our very own hit reality TV Show called 'The Cupcake Girls'. What an adventure that was! After 3 full Seasons, 45 Episodes, 1 wedding, 2 babies, 1 Gemini-Award for 'Best New Reality Show', and distribution of our Show into 95 countries worldwide, I needed a break... and then this happened."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"During a typical grocery run, I realized that the ice cream in my cart wasn\u2019t even labeled as ice cream \u2014 it was \u2018frozen dessert.\u2019 Like you I thought, \u201CWhat is frozen dessert, and more importantly why is it not ice cream?\u201D"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"This should be the moment where I introduce my unique childhood on Vancouver Island, but we\u2019ll skip that. For now, all you need to know is that my upbringing on a self-sustaining farm instilled a passion and priority for fresh, whole food that I carry to this day. So, on that day in the freezer aisle, I saw an opportunity to make a better ice cream. An ice cream without tons of sugar, or any gums or preservatives. The rest is history."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Life really is, BETTERWITH ice cream!"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"w-25 mt-4 mb-4",src:"images/sign.jpg",alt:"Sign"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Lori Joyce"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Founder and CEO"})]})]})});};export default FromTheFounder;
